name: ikea-price-scout
description: Chrome extension for comparing prices of Ikea products across different countries (work in progress)

scripts.build:dev: rimraf dev-dist && tsc --project tsconfig.dev.json; npm run copy:dev
scripts.build:prod: rimraf dist && tsc --project tsconfig.prod.json; npm run copy:prod
scripts.build:dev:firefox: rimraf dev-dist-firefox && tsc --project tsconfig.dev.json; npm run copy:dev:firefox
scripts.build:prod:firefox: rimraf dist-firefox && tsc --project tsconfig.prod.json; npm run copy:prod:firefox
scripts.package: npm run build:prod && npm run zip
scripts.package:firefox: npm run build:prod:firefox && npm run zip:firefox
scripts.package:all: npm run package && npm run package:firefox

author: Jonáš Jančařík
